'''Noodles with Mountain Delicacies''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Noodles with Mountain Delicacies is obtainable from [[Ms. Bai]] for 2,500 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, Noodles with Mountain Delicacies restores '''40'''/'''50'''/'''60''' [[Stamina]] with a 300-second cooldown. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Chongyun|Cold Noodles with Mountain Delicacies}}
